# `polars selector by-name` for [expression](/commands/categories/expression.md)

<div class='command-title'>Creates a selector that selects columns by name.</div>

## Signature

```> polars selector by-name {flags} ...rest```

## Parameters

 -  `...rest`: Names of columns to select


## Input/output types:

| input | output          |
| ----- | --------------- |
| any   | polars_selector |
## Examples

Create a selector for columns by name
```nu
> polars selector by-name foo bar

```

Add 10 to specific columns using with-column
```nu
> [[a b c]; [1 2 3] [4 5 6]]
                    | polars into-df
                    | polars with-column ((polars selector by-name a c) + 10)
                    | polars collect
╭───┬────┬───┬────╮
│ # │ a  │ b │ c  │
├───┼────┼───┼────┤
│ 0 │ 11 │ 2 │ 13 │
│ 1 │ 14 │ 5 │ 16 │
╰───┴────┴───┴────╯

```
